name: Rock Stacking Force Field Prototype 0.1a
description:
Avoid the black entities while stacking rocks on all the base stones.

Note: recharge your field in the fields of stacked rocks.

Controls

Movement: WASD & Mouse.

Pick up rock: Left click.

Roate rock: Right click & Mouse.

Activate force field: "F".

What's to come next:

I was rushed while developing the prototype as i wasn't able to take place in the last two days of the game jam. So there is a few things i plan on fixing up.

- Rock rotations.

- More goals and interactions for the player.

- More responsive player controls.

- More AI types.

- General Improvements.
